item.title: Easiest Way to Encrypt Message
item.description: Presume User B want to pass encrypted message to User A. B must have public key come from A. So A should generat a pair of key, one public key, one private key. There will be 2 step in the below. 1. prepare keys. 2. trans message. 1. prepare keys I use Alpine in docker. So just run apk add gnupg will install the tool. Run command below, and then type in name, email, and others what you want to set.
